title: Morning Star
summaries: The Morning Star is a Hardmode, post-Plantera Whip dropped by Blue, Rusty, and Hell Armored Bones in the Hardmode Dungeon with a 0.5*1/200 (0.5%) chance.

Like other whips, it causes minions to focus on the last-struck enemy and increases their damage against their target. Uniquely, it also grant the minions the ability to deal critical hits to struck enemies at a fixed 5% chance. It also gives off blue particles when swung, which generate very faint light.
If the Morning Star hits multiple targets in a single attack, the damage dealt by each consecutive hit will be reduced by 5%.

statistics.Tooltip:
5 summon tag damage
5% summon tag critical strike chance
Your summons will focus struck enemies
